mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDENT_CODE , A.STUDENT_LESSON_CODE , LESSON_INFO_CODE , IS_ATTANDENCE , TO_CHAR(LESSON_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LESSON_DATE FROM STUDENT S, STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SL, ATTENDANCE A WHERE SL.STUDENT_LESSON_CODE = A.STUDENT_LESSON_CODE AND SL.STUDENT_CODE = S.STUDENT_CODE AND S.STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode}
